group_1.textLeft: *Sigh*
How embarrassing. Bawling my eyes out...

group_1.textRight: And crying isn't a bad thing at all. It makes@you feel better!
She's right. We've already proved that.
Um...if it helped cheer you up even a@little, I'm glad.

group_1.textLeft: It did. Thank you. I'm all right now.

group_1.textRight: Things appear to have calmed down here too.
For the moment, the Feathers seem to have@lost their drive to fight.

group_1.textLeft: I see.
(What they really need to hear is Mifuyu's @words...)
(If only there was some way she could reach@them...)
Would it be all right if I left you girls to@handle things here?

group_1.textRight: You have another task you must carry out?
The Magical Girls of Kamihama will handle@things here.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you.
...Madoka.
Sayaka.
Homura.
I'm sorry for keeping you waiting.
I'm going to head to Hotel Fendt Hope...to@where the Magius are now.
Iroha and her group are almost certainly@fighting there now.
And I have something I must do there too.
Will you help me, so I can take@responsibility for what I've done?

group_1.textRight: We'd follow you even if you said you didn't@want us to!
I'll try my best not to drag you down!

group_1.textLeft: Also...
We can talk and run at the same time. I have@something I'd like to say.
It's...about me.

group_1.narration: I want them to know how happy@what they just said made me.@I'm not confident I can express myself well.
But I really want to make sure they at least@know that they made me very happy.
I don't want to be the only one who gets to@have them share my burden, or pull me up.
When they're going through hard times,@I want to help them too. I want to take some@of their load off and offer them a hand.
I want to tell them that with my own words.
Not when it's all over.@Now, when I know I can tell them.

group_1.textCenter: (But now that the time has come to actually@say it out loud...)
(I feel so embarrassed...)
Mami?
Um, well...
It's a little embarrassing. So forgive me, but@I'm going to face forward while I talk.
What you said to me before... It made me@very, very happy.
You said you'd stay by my side, and it truly@moved me.
That's why...
That's why I want you to rely on me, too.
Not as a veteran Magical Girl. But as your@ally...
And as your friend.

group_1.textRight: You got it! When things get rough, we'll@depend on you!
Yes. It's not good to keep things all@bottled up.

group_1.textLeft: I'm scared of so many things.
But...even though I get scared if I'm alone,@and have no idea what to do...
I realized that if I'm not alone, I can stand@up and fight.
So... I'll rely on you too, Mami.

group_1.textCenter: So will I.
If we let others take some of the weight@when times are tough, it'll all work out.
Sayaka and Homura taught me that.
We'll tell you when we're having a hard@time.
Because we want to share things like that@with friends and allies.

group_1.narration: I felt so happy I had no idea what to do.@In the past, I'd just shouldered everything@alone. That felt so ridiculous now.
The one thing I wanted so much...
It was right in front of me all along.@If only I had thought to talk@to them about it earlier...
I want to look them in the eye now and@say this. I'm sure I must be a teary mess.@But even so...

group_1.textCenter: Thank you.
So, Mami...

group_1.textLeft: You can start relying on us right away!

group_1.textCenter: Yes... I'll be counting on you.
Here's what we need to do.
